name: Coin Collector (voicelessreason)
description:
This is just some BS I made in pygame as a proof of concept. To play download and unzip and run the executable. Code is available if you would prefer to run it yourself with no zip: https://github.com/voicelessreason/coin_collector_game 

Most visual assets are open source and from https://www.kenney.nl/, besides the asteroid which is from  https://www.seekpng.com/ (personal use only)

Soundtrack is from https://www.soundcloud.com/voicelessreason 

Coin effect from https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/341695

Game over sound effect from https://freesound.org/people/myfox14/sounds/382310/
